trans-unit.source: Represents a restriction on a set of columns in which all values must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 表示所有值都必須是唯一的資料行集限制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is enforced on a single column (or columns) to ensure that a primary key value is unique.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>會強制執行以確保主索引鍵值是唯一的單一資料行 （或資料行）。

trans-unit.source: Constraints are not enforced unless the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.EnforceConstraints%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束不會強制執行除非<xref:System.Data.DataSet.EnforceConstraints%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> is merged with a second <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, constraints are not enforced until all merges are completed.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.DataSet>合併的第二個<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，條件約束不會強制執行直到完成所有合併。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> and sets the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.EnforceConstraints%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>至<xref:System.Data.DataSet>並設定<xref:System.Data.DataSet.EnforceConstraints%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: This type is suitable for multithreaded read operations.
trans-unit.target: 此類型是適用於多執行緒的讀取作業。

trans-unit.source: You must synchronize any write operations.
trans-unit.target: 您必須同步處理任何寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> to constrain.
trans-unit.target: 要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> and assigns it to the <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.ParentKeyConstraint%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立新<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>並將其指派給<xref:System.Data.DataRelation.ParentKeyConstraint%2A>屬性<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>。

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects to constrain.
trans-unit.target: 要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> class with the given array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 物件的指定陣列，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> to constrain.
trans-unit.target: 要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the constraint is a primary key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示條件約束是主索引鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> class with the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> to constrain, and a value specifying whether the constraint is a primary key.
trans-unit.target: 使用要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 和指定條件約束是否為主索引鍵的值，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects to constrain.
trans-unit.target: 要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the constraint is a primary key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示條件約束是主索引鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> class with an array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects to constrain, and a value specifying whether the constraint is a primary key.
trans-unit.target: 使用要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 物件陣列和指定條件約束是否為主索引鍵的值，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> to constrain.
trans-unit.target: 要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> class with the specified name and <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> and assigns it to the <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.ParentKeyConstraint%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立新<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>並將其指派給<xref:System.Data.DataRelation.ParentKeyConstraint%2A>屬性<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects to constrain.
trans-unit.target: 要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> class with the specified name and array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 物件的陣列，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with two columns, and adds a new <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.DataTable>具有兩個資料行，並將新<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>至<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> to constrain.
trans-unit.target: 要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the constraint is a primary key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示條件約束是主索引鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> class with the specified name, the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> to constrain, and a value specifying whether the constraint is a primary key.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱、要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 和指定條件約束是否為主索引鍵的值，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects to constrain.
trans-unit.target: 要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the constraint is a primary key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示條件約束是主索引鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> class with the specified name, an array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects to constrain, and a value specifying whether the constraint is a primary key.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱、要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 物件陣列和指定條件約束是否為主索引鍵的值，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects to constrain.
trans-unit.target: 要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the constraint is a primary key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示條件約束是主索引鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> class with the specified name, an array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects to constrain, and a value specifying whether the constraint is a primary key.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱、要限制的 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 物件陣列和指定條件約束是否為主索引鍵的值，來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is provided for design time support in the Visual Studio .NET environment.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式提供在 Visual Studio.NET 環境中的設計階段支援。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> objects created by using this constructor must then be added to the collection via <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.AddRange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 接著必須透過 <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>，將使用此建構函式建立的 <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.AddRange%2A> 物件加入至集合中。

trans-unit.source: Columns with the specified names must exist at the time the method is called, or if <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A> has been called prior to calling this constructor, the columns with the specified names must exist at the time that <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名稱的資料行必須存在於呼叫方法時，或如果<xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>已呼叫之前呼叫這個建構函式，具有指定名稱的資料行都必須存在時，<xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the array of columns that this constraint affects.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個條件約束影響的資料行陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataColumn" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following example returns the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects that the <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> constrains.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會傳回<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>物件<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>限制。

trans-unit.source: The object to which this <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> is compared.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 所要比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares this constraint to a second to determine if both are identical.
trans-unit.target: 將這個條件約束和第二個條件約束相比較，以判斷兩者是否相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the contraints are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個條件約束相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two constraints are equal if they constrain the same columns.
trans-unit.target: 兩個條件約束則為相等，如果它們約束相同的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two UiqueConstraint objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會比較兩個 UiqueConstraint 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code of this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Data.UniqueConstraint" /> 物件的這個執行個體之雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether or not the constraint is on a primary key.
trans-unit.target: 取得數值，指示條件約束是否在主索引鍵上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the constraint is on a primary key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果條件約束在主索引鍵上，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A table usually includes a primary key that ensures every row is unique.
trans-unit.target: 資料表通常包含可確保每個資料列是唯一的主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: In some tables, the primary key may be made up of more than one column.
trans-unit.target: 在某些資料表中，主索引鍵可能會組成多個資料行。

trans-unit.source: For example, a primary key for a table containing names might be made up of both the first and last names as well.
trans-unit.target: 例如，包含名稱的資料表的主索引鍵可能的第一個和最後一個名稱以及由組成。

trans-unit.source: To create a primary key with more than one column, set the Columns property to an array of DataColumn objects.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立主索引鍵與一個以上的資料行，請將屬性資料行設 DataColumn 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks the <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint.IsPrimaryKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint.IsPrimaryKey%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the table to which this constraint belongs.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個條件約束所屬的資料表。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> to which the constraint belongs.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束所屬的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example returns a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會傳回<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>物件的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。
